thread.section_title: Reid Cycles Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Reid Cycles | reidcycles.com.au
thread.title: Nenita Comia
thread.title_full: Reid Cycles reviewed by Nenita Comia

author: Nenita Comia
title: Nenita Comia
text: We bought my bike without a basket and got a voucher but changed our mind and went back to buy the basket but we can't use the voucher coz it shld be minimum of 100, as a customer we are delighted to get a voucher but will be more than happy if we can use it in the next purchase with no minimum amount.
